mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Dr. Sidney Isenberg Collection on Carson McCullers Papers, 1948-1971
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McCullers, Carson, 1917-1967
mdRecord.dcterms:description: McCullers describes her continuing ill health. Mentions visits to Ireland, Paris, Virginia, and Fire Island. (The transcript is dated September 2, 1950. The envelope is clearly postmarked September 22, 1950.)

There are several files available. There is one JPG image for each page of the original document. One PDF was created from scans of the original document and includes all pages. One PDF is a transcription of the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Friendship
Travel
Health
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Carson McCullers to Dr. Sidney Isenberg, September 2, 1950 (correspondence)
